strapiPost.title: Local Restaurants Team Up To Host Food Drive for Fayetteville Public Schools
strapiPost.content:
Three local hotspots have announced plans to host a 'Fill the Pantry' food drive for Fayetteville Public Schools.

  • Theo's, East Side Grill, and Southern Food Company will be accepting donations through Dec. 10 to ensure that no child goes hungry during the holidays. -Fayetteville Flyer
  • Over 350 Fayetteville families qualified for free and reduced meals this year, a number that is steadily increasing in the midst of the coronavirus pandemic.
  • A list of items are featured HERE. Those who donate will be entered to win a $50 gift card.

Theoâ€™s is located at 318 Campbell Ave, East Side Grill is at 1838 N Crossover Rd, and Southern Food Company is at 3575 W Wedington Dr #3.
